## Measurement, Analysis & Theory for Intensive Longitudinal Data

[MATILDA provides information for researchers <br> that want to study processes with intensive longitudinal data.]{style="font-size: 20px;"}

##### [**MATILDA mission:**]{style="font-family:Merriweather;"}

[*MATILDA helps researchers consider their <br> goals, substantive theory, measurement theory & design <br> and how all these intertwine.*]{style="font-size: 18px;font-family: Merriweather;"}

[MATILDA's content is developed and maintained by experts, <br> and is peer-reviewed.]{style="font-size: 20px;"}
